value:
$WmMPID_開花ヒルダ,ch17_25_Hilda_F_Bloom01,Face|Ugh! Where's Shez? She said she'd
meet me here, but I don't see her
anywhere...$k$pAha! Took you long enou—$k$p$WmMPID_シェズ男,ch17_67_Sheds_M_Normal,Face|Hey there, Hilda.$k$p$WmMPID_開花ヒルダ,ch17_25_Hilda_F_Bloom01,Face|Excuse me? What are YOU doing
here?$k$p$WmMPID_シェズ男,ch17_67_Sheds_M_Normal,Face|Florina had a request, and since she's
still not great at dealing with men, the
other Shez and I decided to swap jobs.$k$p$WmMPID_開花ヒルダ,ch17_25_Hilda_F_Bloom01,Face|You two are still taking on jobs as a
pair? Kind of weird, if you ask me.$k$p$WmMPID_シェズ男,ch17_67_Sheds_M_Normal,Face|Is it? Gender aside, we are still pretty
much the same person. So why not
take advantage of that?$k$p$WmMPID_開花ヒルダ,ch17_25_Hilda_F_Bloom01,Face|Huh... I mean, I guess you have a
point. It still seems a little weird,
though.$k$p$Fo1500,0,0,0,255|$WmMPID_モニカ,ch17_53_Monica_F_Normal2,Face|$Fi1500|May I have a moment? I have a small
favor to ask of you, Shez.$k$p$WmMPID_シェズ女,ch17_68_Sheds_F_Normal,Face|Me? Well, not like it matters much.
I'm sure either of us is fine, so I'll
hear you out.$k$p$WmMPID_モニカ,ch17_53_Monica_F_Normal2,Face|Oh, well, I meant to ask the other
Shez, but if you say it's all right,
I would be happy for the help.$k$pThat being said, isn't this his room?$k$p$WmMPID_シェズ女,ch17_68_Sheds_F_Normal,Face|Yeah, but it's no big deal—we're not
usually in the castle at the same time.
Anyway, I can handle anything he can.$k$pAt the end of the day, we both follow
the merc creed of using whatever
we can as a resource.$k$p$WmMPID_モニカ,ch17_53_Monica_F_Normal2,Face|You're both mercenaries through and
through, aren't you? I doubt I could
work with another me so easily.$k$pAnd yet, the two of you have simply
accepted it and, what's more, even
made use of it. I'm truly impressed.$k$p
